REUTERS.UNKNOWN: C f2155 reute b f BC-CME,-CBOE-SET-JOINT-P 03-16 0060

TEXT.TITLE: CME, CBOE SET JOINT PRESS CONFERENCE FOR TODAY
TEXT.BODY: The Chicago Mercantile Exchange, CME, and the Chicago Board Options Exchange, CME, will hold a joint news conference at 1200 CST (1800 GMT) today. Neither exchange would elaborate on the topic of the press conference, although a CBOE spokesperson said it will deal a new financial product. Reuter
